page.title: 06Life in Trumpington
page.content: Trumpington is a pleasant place to live. The old area is the most desirable part of Trumpington. We studied it and found that the houses add character to this traditional village. Unfortunately this village is joined to its more modern looking neighbour, Cambridge. In the middle of Trumpington is a church with a Sunday school and a youth club across the road. There are two large stately homes, one has been turned into offices, the other is privately owned by the Pemberton family who also own a large amount of surrounding farmland. However, Trumpington has little to offer in the way of entertainment but it is gradually being absorbed into Cambridge.
